snippet.title: Mexican Smashoff-  Chess meets RPG meets Card Collection - Tactics & Strategy
snippet.description:
Enjoy this single or multiplayer2D strategy board game that combines Chess, collectible card games, and turn-based battle games. All set in a Cyber-Punk version of the Mexican Revolutionary period!
You choose a Leader and assemble a team of fighters from a roster of distinct characters, and summon them one by one on a chess-like 2D board, where they will alternate between moving, attacking and defending each other's Leader.
Each character has distinct specs, including the ways they move, as well as the direction and distance they attack. Some characters can deploy a special power, like freezing, venom, healing and teletransportation.
